name: Long Life Finger !
description:
Save your finger ! 

Avoid obstacles ! 

Climb the leaderboard ! 

And enjoy the BEAT !

Made in 2 days for GDevelop-Mobile jam !

You can also play the game on liluo.io: https://liluo.io/vegetato/long-life-finger

Credits: In game music: By PetterTheSturgeon Main menu music: by Tri-Tachyon - https://soundcloud.com/tri-tachyon/albums
